attributes.action: Close down every in organic farm where animals to the slaughter are caged,tortured then brutally killed in front of each other
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I say we should close down all the intensive abbotoirs, and let every animal e.g cows,pigs,chickens,turkeys etc to become free range , so they are not stuffed into small cages,beaten,get no excercise and do nothing in thier lives but await a cruel and vicious fate.
Animals are living beings as well and have feelings of pain,depression and fear.
At least with allowing them to run wild they have had a chance to have a little freedom and expeiriance happiness before they are sent to be slaughterd.
